title: Implication of change of legitimacy basis in China

content.question: Which of the following is an implication for legitimacy and the Chinese Communist Party (CCP) ?

choices.label: Recognizing the changing social demands means the CCP will have to find an alternative basis of legitimacy.
As the CCP declines in power, religion will play a more important role in maintaining legitimacy in China.
Amending the constitution to allow political competition at the local level would promote legitimacy.
To foster legitimacy of the CCP, party officials will have to reincorporate values from the 1949 revolution.

content.answer: Recognizing the changing social demands means the CCP will have to find an alternative basis of legitimacy.

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Explain how the implications of the author's argument or perspective may affect political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
